channel.title: [PI] Automatically leveling to 99
channel.description: When someone logs in, the automatically level the combat stats to level 99, anyone know how i can change this?

item.title: [PI] Automatically leveling to 99
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Somebody lock this he solved his problem…

he wanted to know how to remove automatically 99 in a skill at login

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Automatically leveling to 99
item.dc:creator: @Love_me_plox Love me plox
item.description:
@Love_me_plox wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:3, topic:374314”][quote author=Love me plox link=topic=470297.msg3438598#msg3438598 date=1292955205]
You could just make ::setlevel, ::master, or ::pure. So people could customize their stats a little.
[/quote]

Your an idiot.[/quote]Because i gave you a suggestion. Nice one.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Automatically leveling to 99
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:4, topic:374314”]You couldn’t find some kind of loop or method (that has a loop within it) that calls another method that sets the level of a skill? For example (if that sounded confusing):

[code]
bool init()
{
login();
methodThatSetsAllOfTheSkillsToNineNineLmfao();
return true;
}

void methodThatSetsAllOfTheSkillsToNineNineLmfao()
{
for(int i = 0; i < 20; ++i)
{
setSkill(i, 99);
}
}
[/code][/quote]

Na, i found it.

Thanks anyway

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Automatically leveling to 99
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

You couldn’t find some kind of loop or method (that has a loop within it) that calls another method that sets the level of a skill? For example (if that sounded confusing):

bool init()
{
    login();
    methodThatSetsAllOfTheSkillsToNineNineLmfao();
    return true;
}

void methodThatSetsAllOfTheSkillsToNineNineLmfao()
{
    for(int i = 0; i < 20; ++i)
    {
        setSkill(i, 99);
    }
}

Read full topic
